solution_line_template: Since Didi was selling each slice for ${price_per_slice}, it means she sold everything for {total_slices} * {price_per_slice} = <<{total_slices}*{price_per_slice}={didi_sales}>>{didi_sales} dollars.
The first business owner donated {first_owner_donation_fraction} * {total_slices} = <<{first_owner_donation_fraction}*{total_slices}={first_owner_donation}>>{first_owner_donation} dollars.
The second business owner donated {second_owner_donation_fraction}*{total_slices}= <<{second_owner_donation_fraction}*{total_slices}={second_owner_donation}>>{second_owner_donation} dollars
